column2: of  Vavuniya  to  any  other  court,  on  the  grounds  that  the  High  Court

Judge  specially  appointed  to  hear  and  determine  this  case 
is  not
The following grounds have been set out in the petition dated 17th July
2023  to  support  the  contention  of  the  Accused-Petitioner  to  state  that
the High Court judge of Vavuniya is biased.
